body:
I'm sure the story and art is nice, but because it's Your Name, I won't read it. Normally I'd read regardless of any tags, but I just think I shouldn't with this anime.

(I'll probably read it next week and fuck around with it lmaoooo but not now)
Fuck! I can't believe an NTR doujinshi has more plot than Twilight

A happy ending would be pretty poggers, but tbh it makes no sense for her to suddenly be sympathetic to the dude when it’s not even as if pleasure was on her mind in the rain. Sure it’s the author forcing it, but it’s even more sloppier than usual

I didn't even know the characters were from that movie, tf whyd the author pick the setting if it has nothing to do except name, ehh fck whatever it probably sold him some extra copies,  

Fck ntr
Love it. This is extremely hot. The art is good.
Dont even care about the NTR, drugs, rape or gangbang anymore. Im just curious to see how this will end.
Sometimes I would drive the Humanity I'm disgust...
lol suddenly feeling sympathy for the guy who blackmailed and raped her

body: Hey this not the link for kimi no nawa movie free stream

I want to see how this plays out since there are still a couple of routes I can predict this going, but it looks like at the very least part 9 won't be done until late next year and I'm expecting it to go up to at least part 10.

for a second, I thought that man could change and be a happy ending
or at least the story would go on like: this man would be jelly over the fated one, and trying hard to win over Mitsuha heart (in a good way ofcourse)
Damn this shit is getting better and better
